PROS:
Performance is great for that price. The processor is very smooth for editing. Gaming experience is so cool. No heating issues. Decent battery.
CONS:
Display could be much better. Build quality is below average.

Only one word - Superb!

It boots up lightening fast and ready to use in just 5-8 seconds. Freaking awesome speed! All the games and apps that i have tried ran smoothly as expected and sometimes beyond expectations. The two downsides are its poor webcam ( which we never use) and the battery. The battery runs out very fast while gaming. 1-2 hours. Otherwise for normal use it will stay up for at least 5-7 hours. You can watch detailed performance reviews on YouTube and all of them are mostly true.

Had a little bit trouble switching from the integrated graphics but overall the laptop is debatably the best at the price it comes. Decent Battery life , good overall performance. If you can compromise on the refresh rate then go for this as it is cheaper than the 144Hz ones but performs the same. cheers!

Bosch automatic front load washing machine became one our best buys of 2018.

water consumption is low,
ease of use

Con : need water at a descent pressure. had to set up a pressure pump. but it was worth it.

Bosch 6kg front load has good performance but allows only 2 kg in some wash programs, as there is not sufficient space inside. During demo, we were instructed not to fill beyond 70% of the drum volume. So in some cases, like bedsheet blankets ,etc we had to reduce our wash load to comply to this criteria . It is essential to watch over these parameters for a good wash (water pressure, optimum detergent quantity, min. Wash load - leaving 30% free space)
